definition: each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to
good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello

sentences.english: Black temporarily at cousin and good li-li jins asylum.
sentences.chinese: “黑皮”暂时在表妹和相好的金莉莉家避难。

sentences.english: I bumped into an old flame of yours in Oxford on Saturday.
sentences.chinese: 星期六我在牛津碰到了你的一个老相好。

sentences.english: I tried to approach my later relationships better, and to get into them more deeply.
sentences.chinese: 我试着去接触以往的相好们，与她们更加深入交往。

sentences.english: Penniman ever knew her husband was sending flowers to his old flame?
sentences.chinese: 你以为彭尼曼太太是否知道丈夫给老相好送花？

sentences.english: Will you stand with your mother for the photograph?
sentences.chinese: 站在你母亲身边照张相好吗？

sentences.english: Palmer the temple to find their own lover complaining of elder sister Ann.
sentences.chinese: 帕巴坦去找自己的相好颂安大姐诉苦。

sentences.english: Nowadays, getting out of a committed relationship and getting into a new one is much easier.
sentences.chinese: 时下，抛弃老相好，投进新怀抱更是易如反掌。

sentences.english: He ran into an old flame of his at the supermarket.
sentences.chinese: 他在超级市场碰见了他的一个老相好。

sentences.english: It is only one month from their hookup to their breakup.
sentences.chinese: 他们从相好到分手仅仅过了一个月。

sentences.english: Would you mind taking a photograph for us?
sentences.chinese: 请您帮我们照一张相好吗？

definition: (dialect) form of address for one's wife/polite form of address for a woman
to hang around/to fool around/to live aimlessly
devil/You devil! (as joke or insult)/the departed
